author: AdrianoDee
body:
#### PR description:

This PR proposes the removal of the `--pileup` and `--pileup_input` flags for all the "non-Digi" steps of the PU ProdLike wfs (RECO,MINI,NANO).

solves https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/46121

#### PR validation:

`*.21` wfs run
title: Remove PU from ProdLike Wfs
